name: The Eve
description: A reverse metroidvania that asks what would you give up for love? Starting where most adventure platformers end, you are at the nefarious villain's final castle after a long journey of earning power to save your loved. After accomplishing all tasks the villain uses its last breath to lock your love away behind a series of trials that require you to give up the very parts of yourself that shaped you. How far will you go? What will you give up for love?
